Package com.pandora.config.species.services

package com.pandora.config.species.services
The package com.pandora.config.species.services contains services responsible for managing the status of biogeochemical species beans. These services interact with the Spring application context to enable, disable, and query the status of specific species beans.

The main interface in this package is SpecieStatusService, which defines methods for checking whether a species bean is enabled (isBeanEnabled()) and toggling the status of a species bean (toggleBeanStatus(boolean)).

The package also includes abstract and concrete implementations of AbstractBeanStatusService, which provides a base class for creating status services for different biogeochemical species. Concrete implementations such as DicBeanStatusService and DocBeanStatusService manage the status of DIC (Dissolved Inorganic Carbon) and DOC (Dissolved Organic Carbon) species beans, respectively.

These services utilize Spring annotations such as @Value for injecting external properties and @ConditionalOnProperty to conditionally enable or disable the services based on configuration properties.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.pandora.config.species
    The com.pandora.config.species package contains classes and interfaces related to the configuration and management of biogeochemical species in the Pandora biogeochemical model.
    com.pandora.config.species.abstractions
    The com.pandora.config.species.abstractions package contains abstractions for representing biogeochemical species in a freshwater context.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractBeanStatusService
    The AbstractBeanStatusService class is an abstract service providing functionality for managing the status of biogeochemical species beans in the PANDORA model.
    DicBeanStatusService
    The DicBeanStatusService class is a service responsible for managing the status of the Dissolved Inorganic Carbon (DIC) bean in the PANDORA model.
    DocBeanStatusService
    The DocBeanStatusService class is a service responsible for managing the status of the Dissolved Organic Carbon (DOC) bean in the PANDORA model.
    SpecieStatusService
    The SpecieStatusService interface defines methods for checking and toggling the status of biogeochemical species beans in the PANDORA model.
